alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 3:46PM EST until December 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of a dusting to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Caledonia, Essex and Orleans counties in Vermont. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to light snow and light ice accumulations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will continue over northeast Vermont tonight, but will mix with or change to light freezing drizzle. This will lead to slippery travel conditions and visibilities will likely be reduced due to fog, which could further impact travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
